name: [Bracing Band](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Bracing_Band)
effects: [Personal Space](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Personal_Space)After shoving an enemy[[See Notes](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Personal_Space#Notes)], the wearer gains a +1 to their  [Armour Class](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Armour_Class) until their next turn.

name: [Callous Glow Ring](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Callous_Glow_Ring)
effects: [Callous Glow](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Callous_Glow)The wearer deals an additional 2 points of [Radiant](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Radiant)[[See: Bugs](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Callous_Glow#Bugs)] damage against creatures that are illuminated.

name: [Caustic Band](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Caustic_Band)
effects: [Malefic Excretion](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Malefic_Excretion)Your weapon attacks also deal 2Acid damage.

name: [Coruscation Ring](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Coruscation_Ring)
effects: [Arcane Radiance](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Arcane_Radiance)When the wearer deals spell damage while illuminated by a light source, they also inflict  [Radiating Orb](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Radiating_Orb_(Condition)) upon the target for 2 turns.

name: [Crusher's Ring](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Crusher%27s_Ring)
effects: [Movement Speed](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Movement_Speed) increased by 3m / 10ft.

name: [Djinni Ring](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Djinni_Ring)
effects:
[Mage Hand](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Mage_Hand) 
Cast as a cantrip ( Recharge: [Short rest](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Short_rest).)

name: [Eversight Ring](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Eversight_Ring)
effects: [Blind Immunity](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Blind_Immunity)The wearer cannot be  [Blinded](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Blinded_(Condition)).

effects:
[Nature](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Nature) +1
 [Survival](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Survival) +1

effects: [Death Saving Throws](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Death_Saving_Throw) +2

effects: [Deception](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Deception) +1

[Arcana](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Arcana) +1
 [Religion](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Religion) +1

name: [Poisoner's Ring](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Poisoner%27s_Ring)
effects:
[Virulent Venom](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Virulent_Venom) 
Point your ringed finger at a target to make it [vulnerable](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Vulnerable) to [Poison](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Poison) damage, unless it is immune to [Poison](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Poison) damage. ( Recharge: [Long rest](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Long_rest).)

name: [Ring of Absolute Force](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Ring_of_Absolute_Force)
effects:
[Thunderwave](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Thunderwave) 
Cast as a level 1 spell ( Recharge: [Short rest](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Short_rest).)

[Absolute's Tempest](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Absolute%27s_Tempest)If the wearer bears the [Absolute's Brand](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Brand_of_the_Absolute), they deal 1 additional Thunder damage with Thunder damage spells and attacks.

name: [Ring of Colour Spray](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Ring_of_Colour_Spray)
effects:
[Colour Spray](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Colour_Spray) 
Cast as a level 1 spell ( Recharge: [Short rest](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Short_rest).)

name: [Ring of Elemental Infusion](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Ring_of_Elemental_Infusion)
effects:
[Elemental Infusion](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Elemental_Infusion)When you deal [Acid](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Acid), [Cold](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Cold), [Fire](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Fire), [Lightning](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Lightning), or [Thunder](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Thunder) damage using a [Spell](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Spell) or a [Cantrip](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Cantrip), that element infuses your weapon.

Until the end of your next turn, you deal an additional   1d4 damage of that element on your first successful weapon attack.

name: [Ring of Flinging](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Ring_of_Flinging)
effects: [Throwing Boost](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Throwing_Boost)The wearer gains a   1d4 bonus to  [Throw](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Throw) damage.

name: [Ring of Geniality](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Ring_of_Geniality)
effects:
[Persuasion](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Persuasion) +1
 [Deception](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Deception) +1

name: [Ring of Jumping](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Ring_of_Jumping)
effects:
[Enhance Leap](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Enhance_Leap) 
Cast as a level 1 spell ( Recharge: [Short rest](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Short_rest).)

name: [Ring of Mental Inhibition](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Ring_of_Mental_Inhibition)
effects: [Mental Inhibition](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Mental_Inhibition)When a foe fails a  [Saving throw](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Saving_throw) against one of your spells or actions, they gain  [Mental Fatigue](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Mental_Fatigue_(Condition)) for 2 turns.

name: [Ring of Salving](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Ring_of_Salving)
effects: [Saviour's Allure](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Saviour%27s_Allure)You restore an additional 2hit points every time you heal another creature.

name: [Ring of Self Immolation](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Ring_of_Self_Immolation)
effects:
[Self Immolation](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Self_Immolation) 
Set yourself on fire to gain  [Heat](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Heat_(Condition)). ( Recharge: [Short rest](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Short_rest).)

name: [Ring of Shadows](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Ring_of_Shadows)
effects:
[Pass Without Trace](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Pass_Without_Trace) 
Cast as a level 2 spell ( Recharge: [Long rest](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Long_rest).)

name: [Ring of Spiteful Thunder](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Ring_of_Spiteful_Thunder)
effects: [Spiteful Thunder](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Spiteful_Thunder)When the wearer deals [Thunder](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Thunder) damage to a  [Reverberating](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Reverberation_(Condition)) creature, it becomes  [Dazed](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Dazed_(Condition)) unless it succeeds a  [Constitution](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Constitution) [saving throw](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Saving_throw).

name: [Seemingly Gleaming Ring](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Seemingly_Gleaming_Ring)
effects:
[Charisma](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Charisma)  [Saving throws](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Saving_throw) +1
[Wisdom](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Wisdom)  [Saving throws](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Saving_throw) -1

name: [Shadow Blade Ring](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Shadow_Blade_Ring)
effects:
[Shadow Blade](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Shadow_Blade) 
Cast as a level 2 spell ( Recharge: [Short rest](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Short_rest).)

name: [Shadow-Cloaked Ring](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Shadow-Cloaked_Ring)
effects: [Shadowthief](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Shadowthief)The wearer's weapon and unarmed attacks deal an additional   1d4 damage against  [Lightly](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Lightly_Obscured_(Condition)) or  [Heavily Obscured](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Heavily_Obscured_(Condition)) creatures, and creatures made of shadow.

name: [Shapeshifter's Boon Ring](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Shapeshifter%27s_Boon_Ring)
effects: [Shapeshifter's Boon](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Shapeshifter%27s_Boon)While shapeshifting or disguising yourself, gain a +1d4 bonus to all   [Ability checks](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Ability_check).

name: [Smuggler's Ring](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Smuggler%27s_Ring)
effects:
[Stealth](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Stealth) +2
 [Sleight of Hand](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Sleight_of_Hand) +2
 [Charisma](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Charisma) -1

name: [Snowburst Ring](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Snowburst_Ring)
effects: [Snowburst](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Snowburst)When the wearer deals [Cold](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Cold) damage, they also create a  4.5 m / 15 ft circle of  [Ice](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Ice_(surface)) around the target(s).

name: [Spurred Band](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Spurred_Band)
effects: [Frantic Urgency](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Frantic_Urgency)During combat, when the wearer starts their turn with 50% [Hit Points](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Hit_Points) or less, they gain  [Momentum](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Momentum_(Condition)) for 1 turn.

name: [Strange Conduit Ring](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Strange_Conduit_Ring)
effects: [Strange Conduit](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Strange_Conduit)When [Concentrating](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Concentration) on a spell, the wearer's weapon attacks deal an additional 1d4Psychic damage.

name: [Sunwalker's Gift](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Sunwalker%27s_Gift)
effects: [Sunwalker's Gift](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Sunwalker%27s_Gift_(passive_feature))The wearer can see in the dark up to  12 m / 40 ft.

name: [The Sparkswall](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/The_Sparkswall)
effects:
[Resistance](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Resistance) to [Lightning](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Lightning) damage.
[Spark Blocker](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Spark_Blocker)The wearer can't be  [Electrocuted](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Electrocuted_(Condition)).

name: [The Whispering Promise](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/The_Whispering_Promise)
effects: [Blessed Mercy](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Blessed_Mercy)When you heal a creature, it gains a   +1d4 bonus to [Attack rolls](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Attack_roll) and  [Saving throws](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Saving_throw) for 2 turns.

name: [After Death Do Us Part](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/After_Death_Do_Us_Part)
effects: [After Death Do Us Part](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/After_Death_Do_Us_Part_(passive_feature))When the wearer is  [Downed](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Downed_(Condition)), they rise once more with half their [Hit Points](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Hit_Points) restored, but are gripped by  [Shadow Possession](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Shadow_Possession_(Condition)).

name: [Band of the Mystic Scoundrel](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Band_of_the_Mystic_Scoundrel)
effects: [Illusion Quickening](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Illusion_Quickening)After hitting a creature with a weapon attack, you can cast [illusion](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Illusion) or [enchantment](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Enchantment_(school)) spells as a  [Bonus Action](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Actions#Resources).

effects:
[Invisibility](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Invisibility_(spell)) 
Cast as a level 2 spell ( Recharge: [Long rest](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Long_rest).)

effects:
[Dominate Beast](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Dominate_Beast) 
Cast as a level 5 spell ( Recharge: [Long rest](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Long_rest).)

name: [Ring of Arcane Synergy](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Ring_of_Arcane_Synergy)
effects: [Synergetic Cantrips](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Synergetic_Cantrips)When you deal damage with a [Cantrip](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Cantrip), you gain  [Arcane Synergy](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Arcane_Synergy_(Condition)) for 2 turns.

effects:
[Blink](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Blink)

 [Ghoulish Touch](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Ghoulish_Touch) 
Cast as a level 1 spell ( Recharge: [Long rest](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Long_rest).)

name: [Ring of Free Action](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Ring_of_Free_Action)
effects: [Unwavering](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Unwavering)You ignore the effects of  [Difficult Terrain](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Difficult_Terrain_(Condition)), and cannot be  [Paralysed](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Paralysed_(Condition)) or  [Restrained](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Restrained_(Condition)).

name: [Ring of Mind-Shielding](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Ring_of_Mind-Shielding)
effects: [Shelter](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Shelter)You have  [Advantage](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Advantage) on  [Saving throws](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Saving_throw) against  [Charmed](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Charmed_(Condition)).

name: [Ring of Poison Resistance](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Ring_of_Poison_Resistance)
effects: [Resistance](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Resistance) to [Poison](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Poison) damage.

name: [Ring of Protection](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Ring_of_Protection)
effects:
[Armour Class](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Armour_Class) +1
 [Saving throw](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Saving_throw) +1

name: [Ring of Truthfulness](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Ring_of_Truthfulness)
effects: [Ring of Veracity](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Ring_of_Veracity)You gain an  [Advantage](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Advantage) on [Insight Checks](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Insight).

name: [Ring of Twilight](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Ring_of_Twilight)
effects: [Treader by Twilight](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Treader_by_Twilight)You gain a +1 bonus to  [Armour Class](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Armour_Class) while [obscured](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Obscured).

name: [Risky Ring](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Risky_Ring)
effects: [Risky Attack](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Risky_Attack)You gain  [Advantage](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Advantage) on [Attack rolls](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Attack_roll) and receive  [Disadvantage](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Disadvantage) on  [Saving throws](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Saving_throw).

effects:
[Invisibility](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Invisibility_(spell)) 
Cast as a level 2 spell ( Recharge: [Long rest](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Long_rest).)


 [Blur](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Blur)

effects:
[Beacon of Hope](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Beacon_of_Hope) 
Cast as a level 3 spell ( Recharge: [Long rest](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Long_rest).)

name: [True Love's Caress](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/True_Love%27s_Caress)
effects: [Fond Caress](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Fond_Caress)One of a magical pair of rings, this allows the wearer to receive  [Warding Bond](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Warding_Bond) from a creature wearing the [matching ring](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/True_Love%27s_Embrace).

name: [True Love's Embrace](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/True_Love%27s_Embrace)
effects: [Intimate Embrace](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Intimate_Embrace)One of a magical pair of rings, this allows the wearer to cast  [Warding Bond](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Warding_Bond) once per [Long Rest](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Long_Rest) on a creature wearing the [matching ring](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/True_Love%27s_Caress).

name: [Burnished Ring](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Burnished_Ring)
effects:
[Paralyzing Ray](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Paralyzing_Ray) 
Cast as a level 3 spell ( Recharge: [Long rest](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Long_rest).)

name: [Crypt Lord Ring](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Crypt_Lord_Ring)
effects:
[Create Undead](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Create_Undead) 
Cast as a level 6 spell ( Recharge: [Long rest](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Long_rest).)

name: [Killer's Sweetheart](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Killer%27s_Sweetheart)
effects: [Executioner](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Executioner)When you kill a creature, your next [Attack roll](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Attack_roll) will be a [Critical Hit](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Critical_Hit). Once spent, this effect refreshes after a [Long Rest](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Long_Rest).

name: [Orphic Ring](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Orphic_Ring)
effects:
[Confusion](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Confusion) 
Cast as a level 5 spell ( Recharge: [Long rest](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Long_rest).)

name: [Ring of Evasion](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Ring_of_Evasion)
effects: [Dextrous Evasion](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Dextrous_Evasion)When you fail a  [Dexterity](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Dexterity) [saving throw](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Saving_throw), you can use your  [Reaction](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Actions#Reactions) to succeed instead.

name: [Ring of Feywild Sparks](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Ring_of_Feywild_Sparks)
effects:
You gain a +1 bonus to [Spell Save DC](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Spell_Save_DC).
[Feywild Sparks](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Feywild_Sparks)While your sorcerous  [Tides of Chaos](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Tides_of_Chaos) feature is active, you will always trigger  [Wild Magic](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Wild_Magic_(passive_feature)) when casting spells.

name: [Ring of Regeneration](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Ring_of_Regeneration)
effects: [Combat Regeneration](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Combat_Regeneration)At the beginning of your turn, the ring activates and heals you 1d4hit points.

name: [Guiding Light](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Guiding_Light)
effects:
[Light](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Light) 
Cast as a cantrip at will.
